title: SNT (Social Networking Tool) Design Strategies to Enhance Participation in Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Platform Utilization Skills and Fundamental Understanding of Learning Community Formation
context.additional_context: Exploring strategies to enhance learning community participation via SNT in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can enhance cognitive engagement (understanding of learning content) by 20% by improving the technical design of SNT.
Learners can boost emotional engagement (learning motivation and interest) by 15% using an SNT-based feedback system.
Learners maintain at least three weekly interactions within a learning community using SNT features optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
